# `select_dimReduction`

select_dimReduction


## Description

select_dimReduction


## Usage

```r
select_dimReduction(...)
```

    list(list("name")), list("name of reduction results")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("return_dimObj")), list("return full dimension object result. Default = FALSE")), "\n", "  ")
